article_title: 'Miss Hitler' and three others guilty of National Action membership
article_description: A  Miss Hitler  contest entrant is among four people convicted of being members of National Action
article_content: Image copyrightWest Midlands PoliceImage caption  Alice Cutter and Mark Jones were found guilty after a trial at Birmingham Crown Court A  Miss Hitler  contest entrant and her ex partner have been convicted of being members of the banned far right terrorist   3582 chars
